Then I delete the data from source_file_location collection
Then I write the data into source_file_location collection
Given I upload the Expected_Golden_file files from Expected_Golden_file_Path into yw-golden-1 AWS S3 bucket
Then I delete the data from target_file_location collection
Then I write the data into target_file_location collection
